	
; LED SOLO IZQUIERDA A DERECHA ---------------------------------------

ANIMATION_FRAMES:
    	.db 0b10000000, 0b01000000, 0b00100000, 0b00010000, 0b00001000, 0b00000100, 0b00000010, 0b00000001
    	.db 0b00000010, 0b00000100, 0b00001000, 0b00010000, 0b00100000, 0b01000000, 0b10000000, 0b01000000
    	.db 0b00100000, 0b00010000, 0b00001000, 0b00000100, 0b00000010, 0b00000001, 0b00000010, 0b00000100




; LED MANTENIDO IZQUIERDA A DERECHA ---------------------------------------

ANIMATION_FRAMES:
    	.db 0b10000000, 0b11000000, 0b11100000, 0b11110000, 0b11111000, 0b11111100, 0b11111110, 0b11111111
    	.db 0b10000000, 0b11000000, 0b11100000, 0b11110000, 0b11111000, 0b11111100, 0b11111110, 0b11111111
    	.db 0b10000000, 0b11000000, 0b11100000, 0b11110000, 0b11111000, 0b11111100, 0b11111110, 0b11111111




; LED EXTREMOS HACIA ADENTRO ---------------------------------------

ANIMATION_FRAMES:
    .db 0b10000001, 0b11000011, 0b11100111, 0b11111111, 0b11100111, 0b11000011, 0b10000111, 0b00001000
    .db 0b10000001, 0b11000011, 0b11100111, 0b11111111, 0b11100111, 0b11000011, 0b10000111, 0b00001000
    .db 0b10000001, 0b11000011, 0b11100111, 0b11111111, 0b11100111, 0b11000011, 0b10000111, 0b00001000




; FIGURAS DIVERSAS ---------------------------------------

ANIMATION_FRAMES:
    ; Carita sonriente
    .db 0b00111100, 0b01000010, 0b10100101, 0b10000001, 0b10100101, 0b10011001, 0b01000010, 0b00111100
	.db 0b0, 0b0
	; Carita triste
    .db 0b00111100, 0b01000010, 0b10100101, 0b10000001, 0b10011001, 0b10100101, 0b01000010, 0b00111100
	.db 0b0, 0b0
	; Coraz√≥n
    .db 0b00000000, 0b01100110, 0b11111111, 0b11111111, 0b11111111, 0b01111110, 0b00111100, 0b00011000
	.db 0b0, 0b0
	; Rombo
    .db 0b00011000, 0b00111100, 0b01111110, 0b11111111, 0b01111110, 0b00111100, 0b00011000, 0b00000000

	; Alien (Space Invader)
    .db 0b00111100, 0b01111110, 0b10111101, 0b11111111, 0b11111111, 0b00100100, 0b01000010, 0b10000001
	; Blank space
	.db 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000
